code_events.event:
Called when the list of Embed Data handlers is loaded.

Callback signature:

array &$handlers

Arguments:

  1. array &$handlers - an array of classes keyed by BB Code Media Site ID. Class names can be formatted in both the short name form, e.g. XFMG:YouTube or a full class name, e.g. XFMG\EmbedData\YouTube
